import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './form.css' import axios, {AxiosRequestConfig} from 'axios'; import { Imovel } from '../types/imovel' import { BASE_URL } from '../utils/requests'; export default function FormCadastro() { const navigate = useNavigate() const [imovel, setImovel] = useState('') React.useEffect(()=>{ axios.post(`${BASE_URL}/imovel`) .then(response => { setImovel(response.data) }) }, []) const handleSubmit = (event : React.FormEvent) =>{ event.preventDefault() const titulo = (event.target as any).titulo.value const imagem = (event.target as any).imagem.value const config: AxiosRequestConfig = { baseURL: BASE_URL, method: 'POST', url: '/imovel', data: { title: titulo, image: imagem } } axios(config) .then(() =>{ window.alert("Imóvel cadastrado com sucesso") }) .catch(()=>{ window.alert("Ocorreu um erro ao cadastrar o imóvel") }) } return (

Cadastro de Imóvel

) }
